verses.text: Why do you take pride \w in|strong="H1732"\w* wrongdoing, lifting yourself up against \w the|strong="H1732"\w* upright man all \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day?
Purposing destruction, using deceit; \w your|strong="H0935"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* sharp blade.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* more \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* good, \w for|strong="H3117"\w* deceit \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* works \w of|strong="H3117"\w* righteousness. (Selah.)
\w Destruction|strong="H1942"\w* \w is|strong="H3956"\w* in all your words, O false \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* God \w will|strong="H6664"\w* put an end \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w for|strong="H8267"\w* ever; driving \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w your|strong="H0157"\w* tent, uprooting \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H0157"\w* land \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0157"\w* living. (\w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.)

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w will|strong="H1697"\w* see \w it|strong="H0157"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, laughing \w at|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*:

See, this \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* man \w who|strong="H0410"\w* did \w not|strong="H1571"\w* make \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* \w strength|strong="H5331"\w*, \w but|strong="H1571"\w* \w had|strong="H0168"\w* faith \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* goods \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* property, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H1571"\w* himself \w strong|strong="H0410"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* wealth.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* am \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* branching olive-tree \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* put \w my|strong="H5921"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* mercy \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever \w and|strong="H7200"\w* ever.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* praise \w without|strong="H3808"\w* end \w for|strong="H0430"\w* what \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H0982"\w* done; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* honour \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* name \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* saints, \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* good.
